issue.title: [Go][Docs] Include error handling in csv examples
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16450](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16450). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current GoDoc examples for CSV reader and writers don't include checking the reader for errors after looping through records.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16450?focusedCommentId=17532256) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13059
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13059>
